title: India should reassess resilience of its air defence systems purchased from Russia: U.K. weapons and military expert
description: Jack Watling, a specialist in land warfare at the Royal United Service Institute (RUSI), a thinktank in London, says India should reassess the resilience of Russian systems such as the S-400 missile defence system, though he does not suggest that India stop purchases of Russian weapons altogether. Mr. Watling is the author of The Arms of the Future: Technology and Close Combat in the Twenty First Century and he works closely with the British military on assessments of the future operating environment. He has also worked with the Ukrainian armed forces and in North Atlantic Treaty Organization (NATO) countries. Excerpts of the interview with minor edits for readability:

Academics emphasize Sanskrit's regional unifying role and aim to foster local scholarship on ancient texts, previously dominated by foreign researchers.

The 14-year-old's dominant innings, marked by a witty exchange with the wicketkeeper, propelled India to a commanding position.  His performance also secured a tournament record for most sixes in a single U-19 Asia Cup innings.

description: Delhi cardiologist Dr. Shailesh Singh advises distinguishing between heart-related chest pain and minor discomfort. He stresses that pain during exertion, feeling like pressure or squeezing, and easing with rest, is a classic cardiac sign. Sharp, fleeting pains or those aggravated by touch or deep breaths are less likely to be heart issues.

title: Elon Musk’s Mars dream at risk: SpaceX IPO may shift focus; Analysts raise concerns
description: Elon Musk's lifelong ambition to send humans to Mars may be challenged by a potential SpaceX IPO in 2026, with analysts suggesting a $1 trillion valuation could shift focus to revenue-generating ventures.  While SpaceX aims for a public listing next year, investors may need to accept high-risk ventures, as rocket failures could be overshadowed by Starlink's revenue.

Delhi’s school fee law goes live: What changes for parents and schools this academic year
description: Delhi's new education act aims to curb arbitrary private school fee hikes. The law mandates itemized fee heads, caps on certain charges, and prohibits disguised capitation fees. User-based services must be no-profit, no-loss. A School-Level Fee Regulation Committee, including parents, will now approve fee structures, ensuring transparency and predictability for three years.

title: Triple H & Stephanie McMahon net worth 2025: WWE careers and business ventures
description: Triple H and Stephanie McMahon's combined net worth is estimated at $500 million in 2025, reflecting their significant contributions to WWE's corporate and creative success. This incident occurred as Sharif continues efforts to strengthen ties with Moscow, despite acknowledging Russia's close partnership with India.

title: Red Fort blast probe: NIA raids Hazaribag home of 'ISIS operative'; gadgets, documents scanned

This raid, part of an investigation into the recent Red Fort bombing in Delhi, focused on uncovering extremist materials and digital devices.

Sooryavanshi's explosive batting, supported by strong partnerships, propelled India to a massive 433/6. The UAE chase faltered early, with only skipper Uddish Suri offering significant resistance.

The singer's cousin, a suspended Assam Police officer, faces charges of culpable homicide not amounting to murder. Two personal security officers are accused of criminal breach of trust. This development follows the singer's death in Singapore, where local police initially found no foul play.

Microsoft AI CEO opens up: 'Told to quit school at 16' - Suleyman on working-class life
description: Microsoft AI chief Mustafa Suleyman reveals his working-class London upbringing shaped his tech vision. The DeepMind co-founder, whose Syrian taxi driver father and nurse mother urged him to learn a trade, lived independently from age 16 before dropping out of Oxford to help Muslim youth post-9/11. Now he champions AI for social good and universal basic income.

title: From ages 8 to 18: How an all-girl team is taking free chess to rural India
description: The evolution of the chess queen finds a parallel in rural India, where the “Checkmate Betul” initiative, launched by US-based Avika Shukla, offers free, structured chess training to girls with no prior access. The programme, run by an all-girl global team, is helping students gain confidence, focus and new skills while overcoming significant logistical hurdles.

She highlighted that players often act freely away from public scrutiny, but Jadeja, understanding his responsibilities, avoids these temptations. Her remarks have gained traction online.

title: 'Something wrong in HC': SC scraps plea on Karur stampede probe; warns TN govt

Emphasizing fairness, the bench also criticized a Madras High Court report on a writ petition's registration. The court previously ordered a CBI investigation and a supervisory committee.

This significant undertaking is also projected to create one crore employment opportunities.

description: India witnessed a surge in GenAI learning in 2025, with Coursera reporting over 3.6 million enrolments, the highest globally. Learners explored courses ranging from introductory AI to specialised GenAI skills, including prompt engineering, LLM applications, and AI workflow automation. Top-ranked programmes came from Google Cloud, IBM, AWS, Vanderbilt University, and DeepLearning.AI. Key skills focused on automation workflows, data literacy, cybersecurity, and problem solving. The trend reflects India’s growing preparation for AI-driven careers and an AI-ready workforce.

title: Who is Mia Sorety? OnlyFans model enters Sherrone Moore affair drama
description: University of Michigan coach Sherrone Moore has been fired amid allegations of an inappropriate workplace relationship, reportedly with Paige Shiver, daughter of former NFL player Jeff Shiver. Adding to the controversy, OnlyFans model Mia Sorety has accused Moore of sending her direct messages, suggesting a pattern of behavior that has ignited widespread fan speculation and discussion across social media platforms.

title: Paige Shiver net worth: 55% salary hike and Sherrone Moore link spark buzz
description: University of Michigan football is in turmoil as executive assistant Paige Shiver faces intense public scrutiny. Her name is linked to former coach Sherrone Moore's firing and police detainment due to alleged inappropriate relationship rumors. Shiver's recent significant salary increase and social media silence have fueled speculation amid the ongoing investigation.

title: Usain Bolt & Kasi Bennett net worth 2025: Career, family, business
description: Sprint legend Usain Bolt, estimated at $90 million net worth in 2025, continues to thrive post-retirement through endorsements and business ventures. His partner, Kasi Bennett, a model and entrepreneur, supports his endeavors while maintaining a private life. Together, they focus on their three children, balancing global success with family values.
